    • Uses of TransactionSupport in org.codehaus.cargo.container.property

      Fields in org.codehaus.cargo.container.property declared as TransactionSupport 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static TransactionSupport TransactionSupport.LOCAL_TRANSACTION
      Indicates support of container-managed transactions.
      static TransactionSupport TransactionSupport.NO_TRANSACTION
      Indicates lack of transaction support.
      static TransactionSupport TransactionSupport.XA_TRANSACTION
      Indicates support of distributed transactions using XA protocol.
      Methods in org.codehaus.cargo.container.property that return TransactionSupport 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Convert string representation of transaction support to appropriate value.
